headers.subject: [tosdr:2303] Yahoo! can remove your content in their sole discretion

html:
You acknowledge that Yahoo! may or may not pre-screen Content, but that Yahoo! and its designees shall have the right (but not the obligation) in their sole discretion to pre-screen, refuse, or remove any Content that is available via the Yahoo! Services.

http://info.yahoo.com/legal/us/yahoo/utos/terms/

This again seems in line with lots of other services, although they don't specify (like Netflix or Youtube) that they may or may not notify you. I'm not sure if that's worse or better, honestly, so I've given Yahoo! the same score.

Topic: Suspension and censorship

Score: 50 (bad) 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
